Examples

RioSpan is, essentially, a thin wrapper around Infinispan allowing it to be deployed to Rio. It provides a lightweight core and some examples demonstrating its use. For details on RioSpan internals and how they can be used in your applications see Extending RioSpan .

The examples require Rio to be built, installed, and started, and RioSpan to be built and installed, per the instructions on RioSpan in 5 Minutes .

The following examples are provided

  • HotRod - Remote access to Infinispan caches using Infinispan's proprietary client/server protocol
